storyInfo: A dirty bomb detonates in the city, leaving countless dead and wounded. The Rhodes Island operators decide to rescue the local residents before their evacuation, with Jane joining their rescue operation. Bagpipe finds that the Messenger has perished and decides to make her way through the city to regroup with Horn.

attributes.content: Is everyone okay?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: We took cover in time, thanks for the warning... *cough*, Janie, what about you? You in one piece?
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I'm okay. Outcast covered me proper.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: But... what happened outside?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I hear lots of screaming... and the children...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Jane, don't go outside yet! All of you, stay low and stay in cover. Get away from the windows!
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: An explosion of this scale always comes in wavesâ€”
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Aarrrggh! M-My leg... The bookshelf's got my leg pinned...
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Will, give Fred a hand!
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Ha... thanks, mate. I can move now.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Are you bleeding anywhere?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just a little bit.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Do we have a first aid kit? Take that acute infection inhibitor right now!
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Huh? Lass, I got a gash on my leg 'cause of the splinter, that's all.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: No, you don't get it.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right now, you're at the highest possible level of infection risk. Did you see the black crystal that smashed through the windows?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: M-My god... I...
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Is that Active Originium...?!
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: That it is.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: You mean, all the black stuff that's blanketing the streets... All of it?!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I'm afraid so.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I... I can't believe it...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: D-Doesn't this mean the whole city's in terrible danger?!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Dammit! Lass, we've gotta hurry and rescue the townsfolk! We're short on time, but we need to save as many as we can!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Any objections?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I figured Oliver would raise his hand.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Mock me all you want later, but get your arse moving now and get that first aid kid packed! Fred, you're hurt. Stay here and coordinate the rest of us! Will, go home and check on your parentsâ€”
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I can go with the rest of you...
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Don't be an idiot, boyo. Family's more important than work! Bring some medicine with you, and check on your neighbors once you're done helping your family!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Thank you, Boss...
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Shredder, old mucker, looks like you and I've got a few more streets to take.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Don't forget about me, Oliver. It may only be a temporary arrangement, but I am an operator under your wing nonetheless.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Lass, don't be absurd.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I'm being serious. Leave the District Ten and its surroundings to me.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That's the epicenter. It's way too dangerous...
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Do we have a choice? Give me a temporary set of comms too. We'll give each other progress reports.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'm going too...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Er, Janie, this rescue op's not a playdate, and you've not gone through training like the rest of us. You don't need to put yourself in harm's way.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Whose bloody idea was it to dump all this Active Originium on a town anyway?! They've got to be out of their minds!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: They bombed so much land in such a short period of time... Whoever planned this attack must've at least ten brand new ground suppression howitzers.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That much artillery...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I watched the battle over the past two days from afar, and there are some formidable Casters among the so-called rioters. That gives their force a certain degree of stealth capability.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: â€”But that's not enough to hide so much materiel coming into town, especially not from the garrison's watchful eyes.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: And they're not stupid enough to point their cannons at a city block they finally managed to bring under their control. As if they'd blow up all the locals, their own men included.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Youâ€”you mean...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Jane, you know the answer.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: No, it can't be...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You mean our men annihilated a city block? It was us... who killed all those townsfolk, condemned countless more to death by Oripathy?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: It's the barracks.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: They know they can't win a war with the Tarans on the other side. With no way to tell friend from foe, they'll take them all down in one shot, even the common folks.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: And they used a dirty bomb precisely because it saves them the trouble later on. The Infected get rounded up, and that gives them the most righteous excuse to dispose of the Tarans.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: They used... the people as a tool like that? Isn't the Victorian Army meant to protect its citizens?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You're agitated. I can tell. That's because you've got a kind heart that most soldiers lack.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Over the last few centuries, the Victorian Army has trampled all kinds of nations and peoples across the world, and it was never out of the goodness of their hearts.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Now I see why the townsfolk thought the rioters were in the right...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: But they're just as ready to use innocent lives for their own gain. They got different masks on, but the faces under them are just as ugly. What's the difference?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Thenâ€”Is Rhodes Island the only side doing what's right?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: How well do you know Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I trust Uncle Oliver and everyone else here, and I've known to trust you ever since the day we met.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: And how well do you know me?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Lass, why be so intense? Janie here needs some time to take this all in...
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: It's okay, Uncle Oliver. I know what Outcast is trying to tell me.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I really am... thankful you took me in when I had nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: And I really amâ€”still confused... Whenever I pick a side, someone tells me I don't belong.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: But, at least for the time being, I know what I have to do.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Please let me come with you. I want to help the injured outside as best I can.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Even if some of them were throwing rocks at you, chasing you away just a minute ago?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: It's just as you said. I can't stand by and watch evil happen over and overâ€”This has nothing to do with what side I choose.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You hear that, Oliver? You're the officer-in-charge of County Hillock. Will you let Jane Willow join our ranks, if temporarily?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Iâ€”I've got no problem with that!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: We've got all the first aid kits packed. Janie, you can come with any one of us.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I'm going to the central block too...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Haha, so you're going with the Lass? Phew, and I thought you'd be scared of her after all that just now.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Nothing!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: If everyone's ready, let's go.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Remember, your own safety comes first. You've got lots of contaminated ground to look out for, and enemies to keep in mind too.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Given the situation, forces on either side won't be too friendly to us.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Mr. Chef! Mr. Chefâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh, where to start? We've got wounded everywhere.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No, I have to find Chef! He should be around here. I need to get him out of town!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I... Ugh, what's got my leg?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A... a hostile?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No, you're out like a light. No threat to me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Kill... me...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Later. Let me move this rock that's got your leg pinned first.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Huffâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: There we go! Oh, it's all mush... And these black crystals... Looks serious.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Kill... me!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I can't...! The Infected... are dirty... I mustn't be sullied like that!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, wheesht. Nothin' wrong with hangin' in there to live another day, is there?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You... don't get it...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: This is a fate... worse than death...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Alright, I don't get it, fine then. I'm lookin' for someone. No one's got help for you now.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Mr. Chef! Mrâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hngh...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: What are you tugging my leg for this time? This... This apron! Mr. Chefâ€”!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (The rock crushed Chef too. No wonder I couldn't find him.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (The intel's still here.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (He tried his best to protect it till the very end. I can tell.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Mr. MacMartin. I don't know your real nameâ€”but I will remember you for what you've done.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Rest in peace, my friend in arms.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Your bravery won't go to waste.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And you. I need to thank you, nameless hostile.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I should give you what you want. But I can tell, you'll be gone soon even if I don't do a thing.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Any last words?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...The Leader.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: You're about to peg out, and your leader's what comes to mind?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hah... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: We... will give rise... to... a fire of rebirth!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Where're you looking aâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: More and more enemies are pouring in through the ruins.
Reinforcements?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The cannons didn't do a thing...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Captain... They're all gonna be in danger!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I need to regroup with themâ€”
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: My mission's a failure. In that case, takin' the communications center's our last chance!
attributes.name: Bagpipe
